title: Serious Ping Issues Concerning the Servers (?)
body:
I've been pretty much been getting 200 ping for 70% of the games I've played since the patch before urf. It is not my internet itself, when I play other games I have zero lag (actually less lag than normal, ironically). I also don't think it is a firewall error, I followed every guide I could to making sure there were not firewall issues and nothing changed. I also don't get messages like 'firewall error' or anything. Sometimes I disconnect from the servers on 30 ping and I have no idea why.

Tried playing with only league open, still laggy.

replies.body: What OS are you on, and who's your ISP?
